pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Tammam Salam, Prime Minister of Lebanon | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Tammam Salam, Prime Minister of Lebanon on the margins of the World Economic Forum Annual Meeting.

Prime Minister Trudeau commended Lebanon for providing support to the Syrian refugees and thanked Prime Minister Salam for facilitating Canada’s efforts to resettle refugees.

Both leaders agreed on the need to promote moderation in the face of extremist threats in the Middle East‎.
